tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE security_camera_footage (
    camera_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    footage_url TEXT,
    detection_results JSON
);

CREATE TABLE SecurityCameraFootageMetadata (
    camera_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    footage_url VARCHAR,
    duration INTERVAL,
    resolution VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE VoiceCommandAnalytics (
    command_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    command_text VARCHAR,
    user_id UUID,
    success_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE security_camera_footage_metadata (
  camera_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  camera_location VARCHAR(50),
  recording_start_time TIMESTAMP,
  recording_end_time TIMESTAMP,
  footage_duration INTERVAL,
  analysis_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE voice_commands_logs (
  command_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  command_text VARCHAR(255),
  command_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  camera_id INT,
  analysis_result VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE CameraFootageMetadata (
    footage_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    camera_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    duration INTERVAL,
    resolution VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE CameraEvents (
    event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    camera_id UUID,
    event_description VARCHAR(100),
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    event_type VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE CameraAlerts (
    alert_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    camera_id UUID,
    alert_message VARCHAR(150),
    alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    acknowledged BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE security_camera_footage_metadata (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    camera_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    footage_url TEXT,
    captured_image_url TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE object_recognition (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    object_id UUID,
    camera_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    object_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE voice_commands (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    voice_command_text TEXT,
    camera_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id UUID
);
